alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Lexington; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Newberry, northeastern Edgefield, northwestern Lexington, north central Aiken and Saluda Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Cross Hill to 8 miles northwest of Saluda County Airport. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newberry, Batesburg-Leesville, Saluda, Prosperity, Ridge Spring, Saluda County Airport, Newberry College, Newberry County Airport, Little Mountain, Monetta, Pomaria, Silverstreet, Ward, Cedar Grove Fire Station, Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office, Good Hope, Belfast Wildlife Management Area, Hollywood Elementary School, Emory and Chappells Fire Station. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 72 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
